scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend-govt install && npm --prefix frontend-public install
scripts.lint: npm run on-backend -- lint && npm run on-frontend-govt -- lint && npm run on-frontend-public -- lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run on-backend -- lint:fix && npm run on-frontend-govt -- lint:fix && npm run on-frontend-public -- lint:fix
scripts.test: npm run on-backend -- test && npm run on-frontend-govt -- test && npm run on-frontend-public -- test
scripts.build: npm run on-backend -- build && npm run on-frontend-govt -- build && npm run on-frontend-public -- build
scripts.coverage: npm run on-backend -- test:cov && cat backend/coverage/lcov.info > lcov.info
